reviewText: This Platinum Disc DVD is a heavily cut version, about (104 minutes) not the unrated version which is about 125 minutes. buyer be warned. but it is still well money spent if your into soft - soft core. and like erotic thrillers.

The version i bought here was severely edited down even from the version that aired on cable, and since i didn't really buy it for the acting, the cinematography or the special effects, it was like buying a candy bar and only getting an empty wrapper.  If there was an unrated or director's cut version of this, i would recommend that you grab that instead.
This is the worst acted movie I have ever seen.  Don't waste your money like I did.
